title: Dragon King’S Palace: The Richest Son-In-Law
alternative_title: 最豪贅婿 龍王殿 ; Zuì Háo Zhùi Xù Lóng Wáng Diàn ; The Most Heroic Son-in-Law King ; The Most Luxurious Son-in-Law: Dragon King's Palace
status: 最豪贅婿 龍王殿 ; Zuì Háo Zhùi Xù Lóng Wáng Diàn ; The Most Heroic Son-in-Law King ; The Most Luxurious Son-in-Law: Dragon King's Palace
description:
Description :
        I am nothing in the eyes of others; my mother-in-law despises me, thinking I just rely on my wife and spend her money. And then there’s a group of lowlifes who are constantly coveting my wife. Who says a man marrying into his wife’s family can’t rise to greatness? Ji Xueyu! From now on, I’ll be the one to protect you
